summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3719 for the improvement of 35th Avenue South, from Massachusetts Street to Day Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45694, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
